settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make the theme customizable.

settings.info: Set font size (no px)

settings.content: Choose your home page sections and their order.
Each section can only be used once on the home page.

settings.label: Fullscreent
settings.info: Choose if you would like the slider to be window height.

settings.label: Slider max height
settings.info: Set the maximum height that the Ico Slider should display at (optional) (no px).

settings.label: Autoplay
settings.info: If you would like the slider to auto-rotate, then set the autoplay rotate time in ms here. I.e. you would enter '5000' for the slider to rotate every 5 seconds.

settings.label: Navigation
settings.info: Choose if you would like to display the left/right arrows on the slider.

settings.label: Pagination
settings.info: Choose if you would like to display the slider pagination.

settings.label: Continue
settings.info: Choose if you would like to display the continue button on the slider to progress to the content. If you want to only display the slider on the page, and no content, then make sure you set this to NO.

settings.label: Fullwidth
settings.info: Select if you'd like the slider to be full width (edge to edge).

settings.label: Background type
settings.info: Choose what the background for the slide will be.

settings.label: Background image
settings.info: 4000px wide required

settings.label: Background color
settings.info: Set a background color for this slide. If an image is uploaded, this will serve as the overlay color as well.

settings.label: Background Video .mp4 or .webm URL
settings.info: provide the video .mp4, .webm url for the background

settings.label: Overlay Opacity
settings.info: Set the opacity level of the overlay. This will lighten or darken the image depening on the color selected.

settings.label: Caption Title
settings.info: Enter the text to show as the caption title.

settings.label: Caption Text
settings.info: Enter the caption text that shows below the title.

settings.label: Caption Horizontal Align
settings.info: Choose the horizontal align for the caption.

settings.label: Caption Vertical Align
settings.info: Choose the vertical align for the caption.

settings.label: Video Loop
settings.info: Choose if you would like the slide background video to play once, or loop.

settings.label: Video mute
settings.info: Choose if you would like the slide background video to be muted, or not.

settings.label: Video overlay
settings.info: Choose if you would like to show an overlay style over the video.

settings.label: Description newsleter:
settings.default: Subcribe to the PUROSHOP mailing list to receive update on mnew arrivals, special offers and other discount information.

settings.label: About logo
settings.info: 500 recommended

settings.label: MailChimp Form Action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)

settings.label: Allow customers to share their wishlist via email?
Size chart image
settings.info: 800px wide required

settings.label: Slideshow
settings.info: Change to any integrer for example 5000 to play every 5 seconds. Leave empty to disable autoplay.

settings.label: Map Height
settings.info: Set height for map(not px).

settings.label: Map Control show?
settings.info: Show/Hide map control.

settings.label: Address
settings.info: Enter the address that you would like to show on the map here, i.e. "Cupertino".

settings.label: Latitude Coodinate
settings.info: Enter the Latitude coordinate of the location marker.

settings.label: Longitude Coodinate
settings.info: Enter the Longitude coordinate of the location marker.

settings.label: Custom Map Pin
settings.info: 100px wide required

settings.label: Pin Link
settings.info: Enter the Link url of the location marker.

settings.label: Pin Button Text
settings.info: Enter the text of the Pin Button.

settings.label: Map Type
settings.info: Select map display type. NOTE, if you set a color below, then only the standard Map type will show.

settings.label: Map Zoom
settings.info: Set map zoom 1 to 19

settings.label: Map Saturation
settings.info: Set whether you would like the map to be in color or mono (black/white).

settings.label: Advanced Styling
settings.info: Enter the style array for the google map here. You can find examples of these [here](https://snazzymaps.com/).

settings.label: Text
settings.info: Enter your content.

settings.content: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
By selecting the Hide Decimal Digits checkbox, the prices will be diplayed without decimal digits.

settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.label: Currencies you wish to support

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.
